nodes.text: Jogan-bats were a type of bat which shared part of their name with jogan fruit. When Temmin Wexley launched a speeder bike out of the bay doors of the MK-4 freighter Moth, it was comparable to a jogan-bat flying with its wings on fire.
Jogan-bats were first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
